data.title: Verse | Interactive Video
data.description: Create immersive interactive content with your videos.
data.content:
Verse | Interactive Video
===============              

[![Image 1: Verse Logo](https://www.verse.com/wp-content/themes/verse_theme/dist/assets/images/icons/verse-logo.svg)](https://www.verse.com/)

[Log In](https://www.verse.com/accounts/login/)

[Get Started](https://www.verse.com/contact)

### Free the story with Verse

Transform your videos into immersive interactive experiences today.

[Log In](https://www.verse.com/accounts/login/)

[Get Started](https://www.verse.com/contact)

Create immersive interactive content with your videos
=====================================================

Enhance and enrich your story with elegant tools that empower audiences to truly engage.

[Create with Verse](https://www.verse.com/contact)

*   01 Entertainment Engage and delight viewers with immersive narratives that deliver truly unique experiences with infinite outcomes.
*   02 Ecommerce Enhance your promotional videos with clickable hotspots for richer, more personalized shopping experiences that drive results.
*   03 Experiential Elevate your product presentations with seamless transitions between narrative and navigation.
*   04 Education Enrich your training and onboarding videos with dynamic decision points that boost retention and understanding.

### Your content, connected.

Verse transforms static, solitary videos into dynamic, connected experiences that invite exploration. Learn why the world’s best storytellers use Verse to create award-winning digital content.

[Schedule a demo today](https://www.verse.com/contact)

Made with Verse
---------------

#### Join the thousands of marketers, filmmakers, journalists and artists who rely on Verse to create engaging interactive experiences.

[Explore more case studies](https://www.verse.com/watch)

###### Spotlight on The Atlantic

### The British Impact

To introduce Jaguar’s first SUV in the American market, The Atlantic’s branded content studio leveraged Verse to combine dozens of original content components into one seamless, interactive experience exploring Britain’s enduring impact on US cultural trends.

[Learn more](https://www.verse.com/news/how-jaguar-used-interactive-video-to-launch-the-next-british-invasion/)

###### Spotlight on British Telecom

### Unstoppable

British Telecom used Verse to put viewers in the shoes of a woman juggling babysitting and working from home. The choose-your-own-adventure campaign was recognized by AdAge, Marketing Communication News, Campaign UK and more.

[Learn more](https://www.verse.com/news/bts-interactive-film-puts-you-in-the-shoes-of-a-woman-juggling-babysitting-and-working-from-home/)

Previous

Next

> Rarely do interactive content experiences feel this intuitive and flow so naturally, which is thanks in part to the use of Verse, an interactive video platform. After this series, I expect that we’ll start to see more top-tier publishers using their technology.

##### Shawn Ragell

Pressboard on Jaguar’s Verse series The British Impact

> If you're already shooting video, this is a no-brainer. I think the way we've always done video is like a hammer and chisel and we're carving hieroglyphics, and this is an entire toolbox of different things. It unlocks so many possibilities.

##### Ren LaForme

Digital Tools Journalist, The Poynter Institute

> People were watching it for 20, 22, 25 minutes, which is insane. I’ve been doing video for newspapers and magazines for ten years, and we’re lucky if people are watching it after the first minute and a half. So right then, I was like, something special is happening here.

##### Shaminder Dulai

Director of Photography at Newsweek on their Verse story Undertow

### We're more than a platform. We're a partner.

Need more help? Our award-winning creative teams can meet the demands of any story and help turn your vision into reality. Whether it's video and animation production or custom web development, we've got you covered.

[Request a creative consultation](https://www.verse.com/contact)
